page.description: Time subtraction produces a date time value or number by subtracting an integral or fractional number of Seconds from Operand1.

prototypes.prototype: Result as D = Operand1 as T - Seconds as N
Seconds as N = Operand1 as T - Operand2 as T

section.title: Examples:
section.description: The following example shows how to modify a date time variable (type T) by subtracting seconds.
